tool_description: LINE Messaging API lets you develop two-way communication between your service and LINE users. Push and reply messages Push messages are messages that your bot can send to users at any time. Reply messages are messages that your bot sends in response to users' messages. 1-on-1 and group chats Send messages not only to users who have added your bot as a friend but also in group chats that your bot has been added to.
name: LINE Messaging
title: LINE Messaging

api_list.name: Get content
api_list.description: Gets image, video, and audio data sent by users.

api_list.name: Get rich menu ID of user
api_list.description: Gets the ID of the rich menu linked to a user.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID. Found in the source object of webhook event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.

api_list.name: Download rich menu image
api_list.description: Downloads an image associated with a rich menu.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of the rich menu with the image to be downloaded

api_list.name: Get rich menu list
api_list.description: Gets a list of all uploaded rich menus.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get rich menu
api_list.description: Gets a rich menu via a rich menu ID.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

api_list.name: Get profile

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID that is returned in a webhook event object. Do not use the LINE ID found on LINE.

api_list.name: Get default rich menu ID
api_list.description: Gets the ID of the default rich menu set with the Messaging API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/user/all/richmenu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get number of sent reply messages
api_list.description: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/reply endpoint.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date the messages were sent. Format: yyyyMMdd (Example: 20191231) Timezone: UTC+9
